column4: I have a silly question. How can I watch a DVD movie? I need to install the correct codec, right?
just open the movie with totem movie player ,and it will search and install codecs automatically
I tried. I shall try again.
gartral totem is best at auto codec installation
what is the easiest way to install that?
its already installed ,its the default movie player in ubuntu, go to menu>soundand video>movie player
just double click on dvd and it will run
is there page with directions to install it?
i gave you the link to 64 bit flash
create a folder called plugins in the .mozilla direcotr
are you following me or someone else? one at a time only
I will follow you. My question is: Do I need to uninstall flash first? I'm having problems with flash chat on blogtv.com
ntn yes need to uninstall all previous flash instalaltion
just do a sudo apt-get remove flashplugin-nonfree
